Learn with Locals while you travel!
Learn new skills, meet people and have fun!

Learn Yoga amaranta in Bali, Indonesia

with Amaranta

Learn the basics of Ashtanga yoga and how to keep practicing on your own.

Amaranta is a professional yoga teacher based in bali, Indonesia. Hailing from Mexico, Amaranta has called Bali her home for the past 3 years. Her passion is Ashtanga power yoga.
